name: Bill's Buffalo Chicken Sloppy Joes
author: Bill Breeze
summary: Hard-to-find recipe; made these while a cook for the staff and finally they were added to the menu.
ingredients: 1 (16.3 ounce) can refrigerated biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury Grands!®)
¼ cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)
6 tablespoons blue cheese dressing, divided, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place biscuits 1 to 2 inches apart on an ungreased baking sheet
Bake until golden brown, 13 to 17 minutes
Remove from oven and cool until easily handled, about 5 minutes
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add chicken; cook and stir until golden, 5 to 7 minutes
Add butter, garlic, and onion powder; stir well to combine
Split biscuits open; spread blue cheese dressing over each half
